role_description: An Ansible role that installs scrcpy (which can be used to display and control your Android device) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [scrcpy](https://github.com/Genymobile/scrcpy) is a free and open-source application that provides display of Android devices connected on USB (or over TCP/IP). It also allows you to control the Android device. It does not require any root access.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs scrcpy (which can be used to display and control your Android device) on nearly any platform.
